title: The Mystery of Ravenmoor Manor
description: A thrilling adventure in an abandoned fantasy manor filled with secrets and magic
author: Adventure Game CLI
setting: Ravenmoor Manor - An ancient estate shrouded in mystery

chapters.title: Arrival at the Manor
chapters.description: You arrive at the towering Ravenmoor Manor on a stormy evening. The iron gates creak open as lightning illuminates the gothic architecture.

choices.text: Enter through the grand front door

chapters.title: The Grand Foyer
chapters.description: You push through the heavy wooden doors into a vast foyer. Moonlight streams through tall windows, illuminating portraits of nobles and a grand staircase leading upward. Dust particles dance in the air.

chapters.title: The Side Door
chapters.description: You find an ornate side door concealed by overgrown ivy. It's slightly ajar, revealing a soft blue glow from within.

chapters.title: The Overgrown Gardens
chapters.description: Ancient stone paths wind through the manor's neglected gardens. Statues of forgotten guardians stand sentinel, and you notice a small stone gazebo in the distance.

chapters.title: The Upper Landing
chapters.description: At the top of the staircase, a long corridor stretches before you. Doors line both sides, and at the far end, you see a faint magical shimmer.

choices.text: Open the nearest door on the left
Open the nearest door on the right

chapters.title: The Library
chapters.description: You discover a grand library filled with ancient tomes and scrolls. A dusty desk holds an open journal with fresh ink marks - someone has been here recently!

chapters.title: Light Discovered
chapters.description: As you light the torches, the foyer illuminates magnificently. You now see intricate murals on the ceiling depicting an ancient magical ritual. A hidden door becomes visible in the shadows.

chapters.title: The Magical Chamber
chapters.description: You step into a chamber filled with floating blue orbs of light. In the center stands an ancient altar with a crystalline object pulsing with energy.

choices.text: Study the altar without touching anything

chapters.title: The Spell Chamber
chapters.description: You reach the shimmer and discover a chamber where reality seems to bend. You find the source - a spell book open to a powerful incantation, guarded by ethereal magic.

chapters.title: The Curse Breaks
chapters.description: As you grasp the crystal, magic surges through you. The manor trembles, walls crumble, and suddenly you find yourself outside as dawn breaks. The manor begins to fade like a dream.
chapters.message: You have broken the ancient curse! The manor fades as you clutch the crystal - proof of your incredible adventure.

chapters.title: The Manor Restored
chapters.description: You slam the spell book shut with determination. The magical energy dissipates, and the manor stabilizes. As morning light floods the corridors, the curse is lifted.
chapters.message: Through wisdom and courage, you have saved Ravenmoor Manor from eternal damnation!

chapters.title: Transformation
chapters.description: The incantation flows from your lips, and magic consumes you. Your form changes, merging with the manor's ancient magic.
chapters.message: You have become one with the manor, eternally guarding its secrets as both keeper and ghost.
